r.s: Client extension for Sphinx - opensource SQL full-text search engine
r.d: This extension provides bindings for libsphinxclient, client library for Sphinx.
r.n: - Added support for new API in sphinx 1.10 - Fixed PECL bug #18325 (support 1.10-beta string attributes) - Fixed PECL bug #17558 (time taken in search result was incorrect)
